Texts.Eng: It appears you will have to ^#71f2f6;activate your ^orange;Distortion Sphere ^#71f2f6;mid-jump^white; to get into this passageway.
Readings indicate these are ^orange;cryogenic blasters^white;. They are not lethal, but any contact will significantly slow your progress.
Telemetry indicates that to make that jump you should ^#71f2f6;delay using ^orange;Pulse Jump^white; until you are level with the target platform's edge.
These doors appear to be on a ^orange;very limited timer^white;. It is laudable that you intend to persevere through such frustrations.
These doors only open very briefly. Perhaps you should ^#71f2f6;position yourself close to the door^white; before ^#71f2f6;operating the switch and dashing through^white;.
This obstacle course requires the use of the ^orange;Dash Tech^white; you have been given. To use it ^#71f2f6;double tap A or D to quickly dash left or right^white;.
To use the ^orange;Pulse Jump Tech^white; ^#71f2f6;press spacebar while in the air^white;. Doing so will give you a small upwards boost.
^#71f2f6;Press F to make use of the ^orange;Distortion Sphere Tech^white; to transform in and out of a compressed form.
